person.content:

Paragraph: Yevgeny Kafelnikov ( Russia ) beat Jim Courier ( U.S. ) 2-6 6-4 8-6

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| Yevgeny Kafelnikov |
| Jim Courier |

The names "Yevgeny Kafelnikov" and "Jim Courier" are the only entities in the paragraph that unambiguously refer to people. The words "Russia" and "U.S." are countries and are not persons.
